pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, May 18, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will speak with Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II, Queen of Canada.

The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable over the phone with small businesses from Papineau in Montréal, to discuss the impacts of COVID-19.

Closed to media.

The Prime Minister will participate in a call with local elected officials from Papineau in Montréal.

Closed to media.
